extendedInfo.description: m-Hypo:-) is a Hypo Alpe-Adria-Bank mobile banking service, providing a range of banking benefits. Payments via mobile devices are simple, secure, quick, always available and cheaper than in branch banking. Among a number of functionalities you also get the Quick-pay service - bill payment via a mobile device camera, an overview of Hypo funds and stock markets.Service prerequisitesYou need to have a retail transaction account at Hypo Bank.Your mobile device needs to have Internet access.Three-step service implementation:-visit any Hypo Bank branch office;-get a username and first part of the activation key;-receive the second part via a text message and download application support from the Internet.What m-Hypo:-) provides:All accountsTransaction accounts (overview of balance, turnover, transaction history)Savings (overview of balances)Loans (overview of balance, loan annuity payments)Credit cards (overview of balance and turnover, card status, transaction history)OrdersInternal order creationPayment to accounts at other banksForeign currency purchase/saleUseful informationNews, offers, special promotionsExchange rate list and currency calculatorATM and bank branch searchContactsInstant paymentsQuick-pay service - bill payment via a mobile device cameraQuick  payments - based on templatesInvestment portfolioFunds (overview of own Hypo fund portfolio performance)eTrade (overview of own portfolio, current price/balance of selected security)SecurityUsing m-Hypo:-) application is absolutely secure. Access to all financial data and functionalities is enabled via a PIN, known only to the user so no abuse is possible in case of mobile device theft or loss. No data related to accounts or PIN are stored in the mobile device, guaranteeing data secrecy. Application gets locked after 5 successive erroneous PIN entries, providing additional security against unwarranted access.

reviews.title: Lose!!!
reviews.comment: Svaki drugi put ne mogu upisati brojeve u polja, tipkovnica sve prepoznaje ali nista se ne vidi. Grske a konekcijom, 100 puta pitanje hocu li izaci iz programa. I OGROMNA velicina programa. Pbz ima aplikaciju ispod 1MB. I da je besplatno, ne bi vrijedilo.
reviews.author: Ivan Perak

reviews.title: Dobar
reviews.comment: Solidna aplikacija iako je trebala godina dana da se uvede u mhypo eknjuzica. Sada kada se e knjizica konacno uvela, u glavnom pregledniku ima samo knjuzica u kunama a valuta nema. Treba se dodatno ulaziti po meniju da bi se otkrilo koliko imas valute...Ocjena 3.
reviews.author: Divo Sambrailo

reviews.title: Sramota
reviews.comment: Aplikacije je cisto sms u evoluciji jer jedino za sto moguce sluzi je provjera stanja. Kliknem na foto uplatnicu, sve fino skenira i onda kliknem plati a on obradjuje nalog pa opet kliknem plati a on obradjuje nalog. Izadjem iz aplikacije i opet pokusam uc ali me trazi pocetna dva koda za aktivaciju aplikacije...:) lose slozena aplikacija s milijun bug-ova. Sva sreca pa mogu ukinut uslugu prije nego se krene naplacivat. Bravo IT hypo!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Odli\304\215an 5
reviews.comment: Savr\305\241eno, brzo, a\305\276urno,jednostavno i precizno. Aplikacija je tek implentirana, pa o\304\215ekujem daljnje napretke po pitanju funkcionalnosti,ali i ovo do sada je jako povalno!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Traljavo
reviews.comment: Osim sto obavlja osnovnu funkciju kako treba, sve ostalo je napravljeno dosta ispodprosjecno. Mislim na dizajn, brzinu i izvedbu. Moze to puno bolje.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Onako
reviews.comment: Jos kruha I palente,tipke pre male,potvrda na placanju ne funkcionira odmah,jos kruha I palente
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Predlosci ruse aplikaciju
reviews.comment: Aplikacija se stalno rusi kad se koriste predlosci.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jako lose
reviews.comment: Ovo je stvarno lose :-( Trzavo, ne radi back button (!!!). Sigurno je nekakav embeddani web koji radi jako sporo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Razocaranje
reviews.comment: Zasto je tako sporo? Design? Cekam Hypo mobile banking sto godina i onda mi date ovo. ;-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool indeed
reviews.comment: Vrlo cool mobilno bankarstvo. Svaka cast Hypo!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spoooroooo!
reviews.comment: Imao sam rba app tako da mogu reci da je ova vrlo spora.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: dobra app! jedva cekam update!  dobro radi za pocetnu verziju!  foto uplatnica je veoma cool stvar... :)
reviews.author: A Google User
